article_title: Hospice Oversight May Come From Rare Bipartisan Health Bill

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Bipartisan Congressional legislation designed to bring more frequent surveys to hospice providers in hopes of increasing quality, transparency and accountability has emerged in the U.S. House of Representatives with the backing of the industry and both political parties. The legislation, led by U.S. Reps Tom Reed, a New York Republican, and [...]
